channel.title: [Req] Website banner (description available )
channel.description:
Hey guys i dont have Photoshop and im not very good at gfx what so ever so i was wondering if i could get one of you guys to make 1 for me
im looking for a banner which has the title "Universal Gamers" in centerish maybe with a little angle to make it stylish and a gaming sort of backround like pictures of games such as gunz maplestory and other popular games and possibly a 3D'ish effect to the title?
pixels Width 796 X Height 93
If someone could take shot at this for me it would be greatly appreciated :D
